events.description:
# Welcome to Shwoop!

Shwoop is not currently available at the University of Auckland. Get ready for Monday the 7th of October for UoA Games Week! We're excited to bring Shwoop and our brand partner's lovely prizes to the campus, so be on the look out for posters and our people in purple for more information.


Sign up to our facebook event [here](https://www.facebook.com/events/2319626611701210/).
